body: @SatchPangit literally in the first page she said that she retire idol business to pursue acting career, and the president didn't like that. So he pull some string behind to made her father company went to debt to put leash on her

But why did she announced her retirement out of the blue when she heard of her father's debt? if she needed money ain't it better if she continued to be an idol? if she just wanted to have a load w/ the company president can't she do it while she's still an idol? I don't get the logic behind her retirement.
Uggh another fakku release that was translated and uncensored years ago why bother

That's some real strings he pulled for a one off idol. Even if she is the level of legend to go to such risky length is insane. Who know, maybe he could do all of this just to spite her or to milk her both figuratively and literally to the last drop until she is of no value to him
